name: barmbrack
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a kind of cake or sweet bread containing dried fruit, traditionally eaten in Ireland at Halloween: She handed him a large slice of barmbrack and a cup of tea. With a traditional Barmbrack, trinkets or charms are added into the mixture. In the weeks leading up to Halloween, Irish homes will contain the delicious treat known as barnbrack, an Irish fruit loaf.
